Entries.12{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, @, I'm not sure we would have a movie theater in town at all if the building didn't just show up one day.#$b#Even as is I'm not sure how they turn a profit.

Entries.8{{YearRemainder}}: Between you and I, @, I'm so glad a no pill mill has decided to set up shop here.
Entries.10{{YearRemainder}}: Before I moved here? I was an accountant at an auditing firm.

Entries.10_2: It's important to me for this town to be economically diverse. I don't want to rely on a single industry, like the way we used to rely on those mines.
Entries.12_2: Tourism could be a nice way to make money. We've got good hiking trails nearby.
Entries.14_2: @, have you ever considered holding apple picking sessions on your farm? They're more lucrative than I expected!$h
Entries.16_2: We used to be a major flower exporter. Our climate is excellent for them.

Entries.10_2: The mayor before me? He was an old cattle farmer. Ran a dairy across from Marnie's.#$b#He retired, though, sold his place and went off to live in the city. Felt like he was getting too old for that type of work.
